1.title: All Cuisines, Fully Customizable
1.desc: North Indian, South Indian,  Continental,  Mughlai, Street Food, Authentic Desi and more—menus tailored to your taste, spice level, and budget.

2.title: Fresh Ingredients & Fully Hygienic
2.desc: We cook fresh for every order with strict hygiene standards, we use quality products and consistent quality—so your guests enjoy every bite.

3.title: Professional Corporate Expertise
3.desc: Expertly managed catering solutions designed specifically for corporate events, ensuring smooth execution and a polished dining experience.

grilled_snacks.name: Grilled Snacks
grilled_snacks.desc: Smoky and flavorful snacks grilled to perfection, infused with aromatic spices and herbs.

tandoor_snacks.name: Tandoor Snacks
tandoor_snacks.desc: Traditional tandoor-cooked appetizers with a perfect balance of char, spice, and tenderness.

fried_snacks.name: Fried Snacks
fried_snacks.desc: Golden, crispy fried delights with bold flavors and satisfying crunch in every bite.

spicy_snacks.name: Spicy Snacks
spicy_snacks.desc: Fiery and flavorful snacks crafted for spice lovers who enjoy an extra kick.

dairy_snacks.name: Dairy Snacks
dairy_snacks.desc: Rich and creamy snacks made with milk, paneer, and cheese, offering smooth and indulgent flavors.

conti_snacks.name: Conti Snacks
conti_snacks.desc: Popular continental-style snacks with a fusion of global flavors and modern seasoning.

north_indian_classics.name: North Indian Classics
north_indian_classics.desc: Timeless North Indian dishes cooked with rich gravies, slow-roasted spices, and traditional techniques

rajasthani_delights.name: Rajasthani Delights
rajasthani_delights.desc: Royal Rajasthani recipes known for bold spices, rustic flavors, and heritage cooking styles

taste_of_uttar_pradesh.name: Taste of Uttar Pradesh
taste_of_uttar_pradesh.desc: Authentic Awadhi and UP-style dishes with subtle spices and deep, layered flavors

flavours_of_bihar.name: Flavours of Bihar
flavours_of_bihar.desc: Traditional Bihari cuisine featuring earthy spices and home-style preparations

punjabi_special.name: Punjabi Special
punjabi_special.desc: Robust Punjabi dishes packed with butter, cream, and bold North Indian spices

live_live_tawas.name: Live Tawas
live_live_tawas.desc: Freshly cooked tawa-style dishes prepared live with aromatic Punjabi spices

traditional_indian.name: Traditional Indian
traditional_indian.desc: Classic Indian desserts made using age-old recipes and rich ingredients

kheers.name: Kheers
kheers.desc: Slow-cooked creamy puddings infused with cardamom, nuts, and saffron

halwas.name: Halwas
halwas.desc: Dense and rich Indian sweets prepared with ghee, grains, and dry fruits

cold_desserts.name: Cold Desserts
cold_desserts.desc: Chilled desserts offering refreshing flavors and light sweetness

western_desserts.name: Western Desserts
western_desserts.desc: Classic Western confections with smooth textures and balanced sweetness

live_desserts.name: Live Desserts
live_desserts.desc: Desserts freshly prepared live for a warm, indulgent experience

indian_greens.name: Indian Greens
indian_greens.desc: Nutritious Indian leafy vegetables cooked with traditional seasoning

exotic_vegetable.name: Exotic Vegetable
exotic_vegetable.desc: Premium exotic vegetables prepared with refined techniques and subtle spices

continental_salad_bar.name: Continental Salad Bar
continental_salad_bar.desc: Freshly tossed continental salads with crisp greens and light dressings

assortments_of_raitas.name: Assortments of Raitas
assortments_of_raitas.desc: Cooling yogurt-based accompaniments blended with herbs, fruits, and spices

indian_soups.name: Indian Soups
indian_soups.desc: Comforting Indian soups flavored with traditional spices and herbs

thai_soups.name: Thai Soups
thai_soups.desc: Fragrant Thai soups infused with lemongrass, galangal, and fresh herbs

chinese_soups.name: Chinese Soups
chinese_soups.desc: Flavorful Chinese soups with vegetables, noodles, and aromatic seasonings

greek_salad.name: Greek Salad
greek_salad.desc: Crisp greens, tomatoes, olives, and feta tossed in classic Greek dressing

spinach_salad.name: Spinach Salad
spinach_salad.desc: Fresh spinach leaves paired with mushrooms, egg, and warm vinaigrette

continental.name: Continental
continental.desc: European-style soups with light textures and refined flavors

modern_indian.name: Modern Indian
modern_indian.desc: Contemporary Indian soups reimagined with creative ingredients

european_classics.name: European Classics
european_classics.desc: Traditional European soups prepared using classic recipes

western_comfort.name: Western Comfort
western_comfort.desc: Hearty Western soups designed for warmth and comfort

authentic_thai.name: Authentic Thai
authentic_thai.desc: Traditional Thai soups featuring bold, authentic spice profiles

ching_chinese.name: Ching Chinese
ching_chinese.desc: Indo-Chinese soups with familiar flavors and spicy undertones

afghani_delights.name: Afghani Delights
afghani_delights.desc: Mild yet flavorful Afghan-style soups with rich textures

tawa_paratha_live.name: Tawa Paratha Live
tawa_paratha_live.desc: Hot, flaky parathas cooked live on the tawa and served fresh

tawa_fulka_roti.name: Tawa Fulka (Roti)
tawa_fulka_roti.desc: Soft, puffed rotis freshly cooked on a traditional tawa

tandoori_breads.name: Tandoori Breads
tandoori_breads.desc: Assorted breads baked in a clay tandoor with smoky aroma

live_parathas.name: Live Parathas
live_parathas.desc: Fresh parathas prepared live using traditional dough and fillings

steamed_rice.name: Steamed Rice
steamed_rice.desc: Perfectly steamed rice with delicate texture and natural aroma

biryanis.name: Biryanis
biryanis.desc: Fragrant rice layered with spices, herbs, and vegetables or meat

sweet_rice.name: Sweet Rice
sweet_rice.desc: Lightly sweetened rice dishes infused with aromatic flavors

dimsum.name: Dimsum
dimsum.desc: Steamed dumplings filled with delicately seasoned vegetables or meats

sushi.name: Sushi
sushi.desc: Freshly rolled sushi with seasoned rice and premium fillings

pizza.name: Pizza
pizza.desc: Freshly baked pizzas topped with flavorful sauces and melted cheese

avocado_bar.name: Avocado Bar
avocado_bar.desc: Fresh avocado-based creations paired with global seasonings

shawarma.name: Shawarma
shawarma.desc: Slow-roasted marinated fillings wrapped in warm bread with sauces

pasta.name: Pasta
pasta.desc: Classic pasta dishes prepared with rich sauces and fresh ingredients

teppanyaki.name: Teppanyaki
teppanyaki.desc: Live Japanese-style grilling with fresh ingredients and bold flavors

burrata.name: Burrata
burrata.desc: Soft Italian burrata cheese with creamy center and delicate texture

bao.name: Bao
bao.desc: Soft steamed buns filled with flavorful meats or vegetables

oriental_bowl.name: Oriental Bowl
oriental_bowl.desc: Wholesome bowls featuring fresh ingredients and oriental flavors

delhi_chaat.name: Delhi Special
delhi_chaat.desc: Iconic Delhi street chaats bursting with tangy chutneys, bold spices, and classic flavors.

kolkata_chaat.name: UP Special
kolkata_chaat.desc: Traditional Uttar Pradesh–style chaats known for balanced spices and rich, layered taste.

fusion_chaat.name: Bespoke Special
fusion_chaat.desc: Signature chaats crafted with creative combinations of Indian and global flavors.

continental_chaat.name: Millet Special
continental_chaat.desc: Healthy and wholesome chaats made with nutritious millets and fresh ingredients.

health_conscious_chaat.name: Western Style
health_conscious_chaat.desc: Modern, western-inspired chaats featuring light flavors and contemporary presentation.

millet_chaat.name: Fusion Style
millet_chaat.desc: Innovative chaats blending Indian street food with global cuisines and unique twists.

desi_style.name: Desi Style
desi_style.desc: Authentic desi chaats prepared using traditional recipes and timeless Indian flavors.

regular_chaats.name: Regular Chaats
regular_chaats.desc: All-time favorite classic chaats perfect for everyday indulgence.

malabari_paratha.name: Malabari Paratha
malabari_paratha.desc: Soft, flaky layered paratha from the Malabar coast, rich and buttery in taste

vegetable_stew.name: Vegetable Stew
vegetable_stew.desc: Mild and aromatic coconut milk stew cooked with fresh vegetables and whole spices

appam.name: Appam
appam.desc: Soft fermented rice pancakes with crisp edges and a fluffy center

masala_plain_dosa.name: Masala and Plain Dosa
masala_plain_dosa.desc: Thin, crispy dosas served plain or filled with classic spiced potato masala

idli_dosa.name: Idli Dosa
idli_dosa.desc: Steamed fluffy idlis paired with golden, crispy fermented dosas

sambar.name: Sambar
sambar.desc: Traditional South Indian lentil stew with vegetables, tamarind, and aromatic spices

thakkali_sadam.name: Thakkali Sadam
thakkali_sadam.desc: Flavorful South Indian tomato rice seasoned with fragrant spices

andhra_bhindi_masala.name: Andhra Bhindi Masala
andhra_bhindi_masala.desc: Fiery Andhra-style okra curry tossed with bold spices and tangy flavors
